name: Cyborg3003
description:
Cyborg3003 is a Co-op Survival Horror first-person shooter (third-person option) set in alien planets very distant form Earth. The year is 3003 and you and your friends are cyborgs dropped into these locations with a simple mission: Survive long enough to cleanse the area of the alien planets.

Please remember that the Beta build is still an incomplete version of the game. It will still have bugs and quirks, and will require lots of additional content before it is ready for full release. Because of our Supporters and with your help, we will continue to push Cyborg 3003, adding more content (new maps, characters, weapons, etc.), and further refining it to get the game up to the standard that you deserve.



. Cooperative gameplay for up to six players against multiple waves of monsters and aliens
. Slow-motion “Venontime” to better watch those crucial and violent creature deaths, even in multiplayer
. Solo game mode for offline play
. Seven different monster types trying to eat your face off
. The first weapons of the game, the great Venon Strike, the laser pistol and two types of grenades
. Equip your team with welders, medical tools and body armor to help your odds of survival
. Choose which Perks to play with to best balance out your co-op team against the horrors
. Open, non-linear play areas: choose when and where to fight

Cyborg 3003
Earth is gone, the humanity had to find a new place along the universe. And to live on space, our human body can't be like it was before, the only part that we still create like a biological piece is our brain, we become Cyborgs.



Eruptia planet
We are cyborgs and with the help of AI we can keep searching for a new home. Eruptia was our first planet, maybe one day we can live like it was before. Our brain is what still make us like humans.
